Module nl.meron.yaeger

Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Clearable
    Denote that this Object can be cleared.
    Configurable
    Implementing Configurable denotes the Object can, and usually must, be configured before it can be used.
    Destroyable
    Denote that this Object is Destroyable and hence ensures maximum Objects eligible for Garbage Collection.
    Initializable
    Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the init lifecycle hook.
    RequiresInjection
    Implementing this interface states that this Object requires injection of dependencies.
    Updatable
    Implement this interface to be updated every cycle of the game loop.
    UpdateDelegator
    An Updatable that delegates the update to an Updater.
    WithTimerList
    Implementing the WithTimerList interface guarantees that a List of instances of Timer is available.
    WithTimers
    Implementing this interface exposes the WithTimers.addTimer(Timer) method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Size
    A Size encapsulates the width and height.
    Timer
    Abstract superclass of all timers that are available for both a YaegerScene and an Entity.
    Updater
    An Updater contains a List of Updatable to which the update method will be delegated.
    YaegerApplication
    YaegerApplication is the base class that must be extended to create a Yaeger game.
    YaegerStage
